spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Langdedrosa is a 12th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma(spell save {@dc 16}, +8 to hit with spell attacks). Langdedrosa knows the following spells:
footerEntries: Langdedrosa can use the amulet he carries on his left hand as a spellcasting focus for the spells that require material components. He also can perform somatic components even when he has weapons or a shield in one or both hands, and has advantage on Constitution saving throws that he makes to maintain his concentration on a spells.

trait.name: Improved critical
entries: Langdedrosa's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
entries: On this turn, Langdedrosa can take one additional action.

trait.name: Living tempest
entries: Any lightning damage Langdedrosa deals ignores damage resistance and treats immunities as resistances.

trait.name: Aura of protection
entries: Langdedrosa and any creature he chooses within 10 feet of him gains a bonus to any saving throw equal to his Charisma modifier.

trait.name: Improved divine smite
entries: Whenever Langdedrosa hits a creature with a melee weapon, the creature takes an extra {@dice 1d8} lightning damage (already included). When he hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, he can expend one spell slot to deal lightning damage to the target, in addition to the weapon's damage. The extra damage is {@dice 2d8} for a 1st-level spell slot, plus {@dice 1d8} for each spell level higher than 1st, to a maximum of {@dice 5d8}. The damage increases by {@dice 1d8} if the target is an undead or a fiend, to a maximum of {@dice 6d8}.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Langdedrosa's carries a {@item Greatsword|PHB}+2, a {@item Splint Armor|PHB}+1 and a {@item Ring of Protection|DMG}, whose modifiers have already been included on his stats.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Langdedrosa makes two attacks, either with his greatsword or spears.

action.name: Greatsword+2
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage. If any damage die rolls 1 or 2 Langdedrosa can reroll it once.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage in melee, or 8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage at range.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Langdedrosa exhales lightning in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 ({@dice 10d10})  lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Lay on Hands
entries: Langdedrosa has a pool of 60 hit points that replenishes when he takes a long rest. He can touch a creature and draw power from the pool to restore a number of hit points to that creature, up to the maximum amount remaining in your pool. He also can cure multiple diseases and neutralize multiple poisons with a single use of Lay on Hands for 5 hit points each. Has no effect on undead or constructs.
Alternatively once per short or long rest he can spend his bonus action to retrieve 8 ({@dice 1d10 + 3}) hit points.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Langdedrosa adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack from an attacker he can see, then, if the attack misses, he can make a weapon attack against the target with advantage. Langdedrosa can only use this reaction if he is wielding a melee weapon.

legendary.name: Weapon attack
entries: Langdedrosa makes one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Langdedrosa makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Static Cast
entries: This action can only be used once per turn. Langdedrosa covers himself with an aura of electricity thats either provides him with 15 temporary hit points or ends a negative condition on himself, he can after that either cast an action spell or make a ranged spell attack of 11 ({@damage 2d10}) lightning damage.

legendary.name: Thunder Dash (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: A veil of electricity covers Langdedrosa, who flashes for a moment and moves in a straight line as if he was a lightning bolt, reappearing on an unoccupied possition no further from 30 feet. Each creature on a possition Langdedrosa went through on his movement must take a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragonvoice is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as its spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The dragonvoice has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Dragon Fanatic
entries: The dragonvoice has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}. While the dragonvoice can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonclaw ignores the effects of being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Fanatic Advantage
entries: Once per turn, if the dragonvoice makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, it deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The dragonvoice has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonvoice's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Limited Flight
entries: The dragonvoice can use a bonus action to gain a flying speed of 30 feet until the end of its turn

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Draconic Blessing
entries: Presenting his holy symbol, the dragonvoice can turn himself and an one creature he can see within 60 feet gain resistance against acid, cold, fire, lightning or poison damage, as well as advantage on saving throws against that damage type for 1 minute.

reaction.name: Riposte

trait.name: Eldritch Invocations
entries: When the dragonlink casts {@spell eldritch blast}, he adds his Charisma modifier to the damage it deals on a hit. The dragonlink can also cast {@spell detect magic} at will and can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 120 feet.

trait.name: Dragon Fanatic
entries: The dragonlink has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}. While the dragonvoice can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonclaw ignores the effects of being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Fanatic Advantage
entries: Once per turn, if the dragonlink makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, it deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The dragonlink has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonvoice's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Limited Flight
entries: The dragonlink can use a bonus action to gain a flying speed of 30 feet until the end of its turn

trait.name: Life Link
entries: As a bonus action, the dragonlink can choose a drake he can see at 60 feet creating a link between them. For as long as they are linked whenever the dragonlink is damaged he only recieves half the damage while the other half is dealt to the drake.

The drake's attack bonus becomes +6 and adds {@dice 1d6} elemental damage to any attack it makes. The damage type depends on the drake's color: fire for red, cold for white, poison for green, acid for black and lightning for blue.
The drake also gets a breath weapon, equivalent to the one the dragon wyrmling of the same color has.
The dragonlink can cut this link as a bonus action.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage in melee, or 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage at range if it is thrown.

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
entries: On his turn, the dragon guard can take one additional action.

trait.name: Frostbite
entries: When the dragon guard hits a creature with a melee attack it can add 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage to the damage roll (already included).

trait.name: Polearm master
entries: The dragon guard's extensive training with the halberd gives him access to some special abilities. Creatures provoke opportunity attacks when they enter this creature's reach, also they provoke opportunity attacks even if they take the Disengage action, and if they are hit by the dragon guard's opportunity attack their speed is becomes 0 for the rest of the turn.

trait.name: Shaft
entries: If the dragon guard takes the attack action with its halberd it can use a bonus action in order to make an attack with the opposite end of the weapon; this attack uses the same ability modifier as the primary attack, dealing 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon guard makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) frost damage.

action.name: Cold Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon guard exhales an icy blast of hail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 5d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Sentinel
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the dragon guard makes an attack against another target, the guard can use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack against the attacking creature.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Rezmir's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). Whenever Rezmir casts a spell on a creature she is hidden from the target has disadvantage on the saving throw. She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Tainted by the Devil
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede Rezmir's darkvision, also the shadows cover her constantly giving the benefits from the {@spell mage armor} spell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Rezmir has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Rezmir has an {@item Insignia of Claws|HotDQ}, the {@item Black Dragon Mask|HotDQ} and {@item Hazirawn|HotDQ}. This weapon is magically linked to the half-dragon, so she uses her Charisma to calculate bot hit and damage with that weapon. Rezmir can, as a bonus action, summon the sword to her hand as long as they are in the same plane.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Rezmir can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Immolation
entries: When Rezmir is reduced to 0 hit points, her body disintegrates into a pile of ash.

trait.name: Split Soul
entries: A part of Rezmir's soul can manifest as a separated entity, thought which she can see and talk as if it was her {@creature rezmir's shadow|customtiamat|avatar}. That shadow acts on its own initiative and can't really die until Rezmir is destroyed, but it is 'undone' if takes enough damage.

Rezmir can use her bonus action in order to teleport the shadow or restore it in an available space 5 feet from her, the shadow can exist 100 feet from Rezmir, but in order to move further it needs to control the body of a willing {@creature black abishai|mtf|abishai}.
While this creature is active Rezmir's body casts no shadow.

trait.name: Dark Advantage
entries: Once per turn, Rezmir can deal an extra 18 ({@dice 5d6}) damage when she hits with a weapon attack, provided Rezmir has advantage on the attack roll or a non-{@condition incapacitated} creature allied with her is 5-feet from the target.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Rezmir can either make two weapon attacks or cast a spell and make a weapon attack (in any order). She can also replace any weapon attack with a Caustic Bolt attack.

action.name: Greatsword (Hazirawn)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points for 1 minute. The target can make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending this effect early on a success.

action.name: Caustic Bolt
entries: {@atk rsp} {@hit 9}  to hit, range 90 ft, one target. Hit 22 ({@damage 5d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Rezmir breathes acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 53 ({@damage 12d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: I reject my humanity!
entries: Rezmir can take this reaction even if she has no reactions left this turn. Whenever Rezmir recieves an attack that leaves her with half her hit points or less she can equip the {@item Black Dragon Mask|HotDQ} as long as it is within her items. The mask is instantly attuned to Rezmir.

On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

entries: The troglodyte grunt can spit a sticky poisonous mixture of saliva and mucus, when it does the objective is always the target's head, in order to cause blindness. This works as a regular attack with {@hit 5} to hit and 6 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage, but the target also has to succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw of be {@condition blinded}. In order to get rid of this condition the target must use an action to remove the substance or succeed on the saving throw at the end of his turn.

action.name: Symbiotic Entity (recharges after a short or long rest)
entries: Pharblex awakens his magical spores, gaining 44 temporary hit points for 10 minutes. While he has at least one of those points he rolls the Halo of spones' damage die twice and adds it to the total, his melee attacks also deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

legendary.name: Poison Spit
entries: Pharblex casts his {@spell poison spray} cantrip.

legendary.name: Goo Slip
entries: Pharblex uses the goo on his feet to slide across the battlefield, he can move up to his walking speed in a straight line without provoking opportunity attacks.
